title: Harvesting and Storing Water for Crop Irrigation

tasks.task: Performing water harvesting and irrigation system operations for a farming operation during seasonal changes.
subtasks: Observing and analyzing water flow in Limestone Creek during November through March when the creek is at full pool.
Operating a pumping system to transfer water from Limestone Creek into the 140 acre-foot reservoir when the creek is running high.
Managing stored water in the reservoir for irrigation needs during the growing season when the creek flow is reduced or during drought conditions.
Evaluating the applicability of water harvesting systems for smaller farms or specialty crop growers.
Considering potential municipal applications of stored water for backup supplies.
